recipe.title: Banana, Raspberry, and Granola Yogurt
instructions: Coarsely grate bananas. In a bowl gently stir together banana, yogurt, 2/3 cup raspberries, 1/2 cup granola, sour cream, and brown sugar until combined.
Divide mixture between 2 bowls. Sprinkle yogurt with remaining 2 tablespoons granola and garnish with remaining 1/3 cup raspberries.
